Title: Establishes a process for designating transfer-on-death beneficiaries for farming implements
Summary: Establishes a process for designating transfer-on-death beneficiaries for farming implements involving filing a document with the commissioner of agriculture and markets.
LawCode: Ren Art 30 §§550 - 555 to be Art 50 §§1000 - 1005, add Art 30 §§560 - 561, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a process for designating transfer-on-death beneficiaries for farming implements
